Name: Building Destruction
About the game: Multiplayer sandbox with destructible environment. Destroy different maps, build your own, and play with your friends and other people online Demolition: Basically a sandbox mode where you can play around destroying everything and spawning props Building: Build your own map Siege: Protect the supplies from operators assaulting your base. Barricade the building, buy new weapons for cash gained from killed enemies
